application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T1 reduce height by 2m to limit storm damage, improve shape, and improve aesthetics in keeping with canopy where lateral branches have routinely been pruned. Remove low dead stubbed branch and reduce the lowest limb resting on the dead stub by approx 2m to suitable growth point whilst reducting weight from branch that has been dependent on dead stub for supportTip prune the remainder of the tree by up to 1m from all aspects, this is for routine maintenance and to reduce the branches back from the property, to improve shape and form, and improve light penetration to be pruned using mobile platform to achieve fine branch pruning, Leaving a finished height of approx 16m and a finished spread of 7m T2 reduce height by 2m to limit storm damage, improve shape, and improve aesthetics inkeeping with canopy where lateral branches have routinely been pruned. Tip prune the remainder of the tree by up to 1m from all aspects, this is for routine maintenance and to reduce the branches back from the property, to improve shape and form,and improve light penetration, to be pruned using mobile platform to achieve fine branch pruning, Leaving a finished height of approx 16m and a finished spread of 7m
